job_description:
$100k plus 4% commission on all sales. Book $2M in sales and get $80,000 in commission!! You can make $180,000 per year with full benefits!

If you only sell $1M in sales and get $40,000 in commission, you can still make $140,000 per year with full benefits!

The reason we can do this is because we need sales managers, therefore if you get 4%, the Crowne Plaza gets 96% and we can make money easily because we need more business.

We offer health insurance through Blue Cross Blue Shield.

Work at OUR FULL-SERVICE CROWNE PLAZA DALLAS DOWNTOWN IN SALES . A 300 ROOM UPSCALE HOTEL WITH 30,000 SQFT OF MEETING AND BANQUET SPACE. We want you to come and work for us!

IF YOU ARE DRIVEN & HAVE A POSITIVE ATTITUDE

IF YOU ARE A HIGHLY MOTIVATED PERSON WITH PASSION

IF YOU HAVE GOOD SALES COMMUNICATION SKILLS

WE KNOW THAT YOU WILL BE A GREAT TEAM PLAYER

EQUAL OPPORTUNITY EMPLOYER

Qualifications: IF YOU ARE DRIVEN & HAVE A POSITIVE ATTITUDE
IF YOU ARE A HIGHLY MOTIVATED PERSON WITH PASSION
IF YOU HAVE GOOD SALES COMMUNICATION SKILLS
Benefits: Book $2M in sales and get $80,000 in commission!!
If you only sell $1M in sales and get $40,000 in commission, you can still make $140,000 per year with full benefits!
